featured.text: This is because many breakthroughs come up when people venture 20 their usual routines or areas of expertise.
Which of the following is closest in meaning to the word “venture” in the second paragraph? (A) Creative measurement.
Dr. Hare, one of the venture’s co-founders, says a dog’s intelligence can’t be described with a single number.

definition.zh_def: 冒險，特別是指商業或投資上的風險行為。
definition.en_def: A risky or daring journey or undertaking, especially in business or investment.
definition.example: They decided to venture into the tech industry with their new startup.
